summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4003 for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, from North 34th Street to North 40th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48625, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
